name: create_file
description: Create a new file with specified content. Inputs: filename (file name), content (text to write).

filename.description: The name of the file to create.

content.description: The text content to write inside the new file.

name: script_executor
description: Generates and executes a script based on user description. Supports dry_run mode for code preview.

task.description: Description of the script to generate (e.g., 'Create a file named note.txt on desktop with content Hello')

dry_run.description: If true, only returns generated code without execution (for user confirmation). Default: false.
